message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to own a product that has been carefully curated with attention to detail. I'm confident that you'll love it, and I'm willing to let it go for the unbeatable price of $1000000. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this amazing deal?
I'd like to pass on this one, thank you for the offer. I'm not feeling confident about the quality of the product.

In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to offer you an exclusive deal: if you buy this product, I'll throw in a complimentary product worth $50000. That's a $50000 value absolutely free! And the price remains the same, $1000000. What do you think? Is this a deal you can't pass up?
